item.title: CsAP2-09
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsAP2-09 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Citrus sinensis Functional Descriptions: Demonstrated that overexpression of an Xcc-inducible apetala 2/ethylene response factor encoded by Citrus sinensis, CsAP2-09, enhances CBC resistance.

item.title: GhAPX1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhAPX1 Gene Name: cytosolic ascorbate peroxidase 1 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Here, a cotton (Gossypium hirsutum) cytosolic APX1 (GhAPX1) was identified to be highly accumulated during cotton fibre elongation by proteomic analysis.
